title: Meanwhile at Riot
body:

Edit: Oh god its still taking forever to log in, I have to wait over 38 minutes to log in according to the log in screen, that is like half of the dynamic queue wait time though. 

Correction, the queue bumped me up to now 59 minutes because that is what happens when you wait, you get to wait longer.
